name: Thunder Blaster Man
summary:
Tonight the whole Chiateng City and its citizens are very high in various recreational activites that are carried in commemoration of its centennial. Just when a crowd of VIPs gathering in the Mayor's residence were raising their glasses to toast Chiateng City, a mysterious stranger broke into the house from the window and quickly flew away with the cauptured Mayor's daughter, Rose. Very quickly several explosions broke out successively on the street and the whole city was soon in fire.

Do you think that these people, now all at their wits' end, could do nothing by wait and be played by the jerk or some miracle would happen and the people were rescued?
